snippet: The cabinet approved compensation for victims of the political conflicts that have troubled the country for almost seven years, as the government takes steps toward reconciliation.
abstract: Thailand's cabinet approves compensation for victims of political conflicts that have troubled the country for almost seven years, as the government takes steps toward reconciliation.
lead_paragraph: The cabinet approved compensation for victims of the political conflicts that have troubled the country for almost seven years, as the government takes steps toward reconciliation.
